title: Ep. 389: It's about narrative control | Actresses and Social Justice
itunes:title: Ep. 389: It's about narrative control | Actresses and Social Justice
description: In this episode of For Canon Sake, we talk about the corporate press being mad about free dialogue. We also discuss why X-23 isn't actually wolverine.
